title: ☑1 Bedroom in Korea Town Adj Near Silver Lake | Newly Built☑
posting_body: 2300 West Valley Street Los Angeles, CA 90057
Not all apartment communities are created equal.
To stand out in a highly competitive field, there are two factors a successful community needs to focus on.
First, they need to offer amenities that, quite simply, you can't live without.
Second, the community needs to be located somewhere desirable.
So what makes Valley Street Apartments special?
When you come home to Valley St. Apartments, you'll enjoy a place that's designed with comfort, convenience, and functionality in mind.
Assigned parking spaces means that the days of endlessly hunting for a place to park are over.
You'll see that hardwood flooring and a suite of kitchen appliances allow you to experience the convenience and comfort of modern living.
Our fitness center lets you stay active no matter the weather, and on-site laundry facilities reduce the annoyance of that one chore.
You'll find us between the popular neighborhoods of Echo Park and Silver Lake.
Our community offers many parks, shopping options, historic Los Angeles landmarks, and so much more.
And with access to the wider world through easy freeway access and convenient commuter rail stations, exploring your new neighborhood has never been easier.
Maybe this sounds perfect for you and your family and you're ready to join us, making here your next home.
If so, you'll want to act fast, because our apartments won't last long and demand is high.
Contact us online or by phone today.
